habits.name: Read a book every day.
habits.description: I can read 20 pages in a book every day.

habits.name: Water the garden.
habits.description: Make sure the plants aren't thirsty.

habits.name: Learn how to cook something new.
habits.description: Eating toast and eggs every day is pretty boring.

habits.name: Some example habit that is very long just to test how many words I can fit in a habit name before it looks really weird.
Feed the cat.
habits.description: You should also probably feed the cat.

habits.name: Feed the dog.
habits.description: Make sure the dog isn't hungry.
